title: Manute Bol
summary: Manute Bol (/məˈnuːt ˈboʊl/; October 16, 1962[3] – June 19, 2010) was a South Sudanese-American professional basketball player and political activist. Listed at 7 ft 6 in (2.29 m)[1] or 7 ft 7 in (2.31 m)[2] tall, Bol was one of the tallest players in the history of the National Basketball Association (NBA).
